features: 25-count pack of Johnson's Baby Hand and Face Gentle Cleansing Wipes, featuring Johnson's Always Mild & Gentle formula, for quick & easy cleaning of your baby's delicate skin with no water necessary
These pre-moistened baby wet wipes gently remove 99% of germs & dirt on both the face & hands, & feature the Johnson's No More Tears tear-free formula so they're as gentle to the eyes as pure water

Suitable for sensitive skin, hypoallergenic baby wipes are allergy-tested & are paraben-, phthalate- & alcohol-free. These wipes provide a safe & gentle clean for baby's delicate hands & face that leaves skin smelling fresh & clean with no residue
Johnson's disposable baby wipes are pediatrician & dermatologist-tested to gently & effectively remove 99% of germs & dirt, providing you with that extra peace of mind when caring for your little one

Great for on-the-go, these ultra-soft disposable baby wipes come in a handy & convenient resealable package & provide a refreshing clean without the need for water for your little one anytime, anywhere
body.description: Baby's hands and face can get messy. That's why Johnson's Baby Hand and Face Cleansing wipes were designed to gently and effectively remove 99% of germs and dirt from baby's delicate skin while leaving it smelling fresh and clean. Made with our No More Tears formula, these pre-moistened and hypoallergenic, allergy-tested baby wipes are as gentle to baby's eyes as pure water. Johnson's Baby Hand and Face Cleansing Wipes are suitable for sensitive skin and are made free from alcohols, parabens, and phthalates. Pediatrician and dermatologist-tested, these wet wipes provide a refreshing clean with no unwanted residue without the need for water. Great for on-the-go, these disposable baby wipes come in a handy re-sealable package for quick and easy cleansing anywhere, anytime.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hand and Face Wipes Baby’s hands and face can get messy. That’s why our cleansing wipes were designed to gently and effectively remove 95% of dirt and germs* from delicate hands and face anywhere, anytime. Great for on-the-go, these travel baby wipes come in a handy re-sealable package for quick and easy cleansing. Alcohol and paraben freeThe No More Tears formula allows for a tear-free experience and is as gentle to the eyes as pure water. *Transient bacteria on surface skin.
How To Use: Use anytime, anywhere to gently wipe away dirt and germs. Baby hand & face wipes are great for gentle cleansing when on the go. Discard after use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used these for years!
reviews.reviewText: When we first had our child we tried a few different face wipes, and these are by far the very best. They have a mild and pleasant scent. They are soft, and doesn’t leave you with any film or unpleasant feeling on your hands. No urge to rewash your hands after using these (like some hand sanitizers). The wipes are super soft and very durable. We love having one of these in the glove box of the car at all times. They’re great even as kids get older to help clean hands after eating, before jumping back on an iPad or gaming device. I definitely recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have used these for more than 10 years for all ages, from infant to adult. Love that they are safe for the face, they don't leave a soapy or greasy film, and the scent is very light. I keep one in the car, but now that the kids are older, and we use them slower, I do double bag them in a zip-loc bag to keep them from drying out. We have had some packs that have taken us up to six months to use, and they stay in good condition without any molding or anything for that period of time. I had one kid with eczema and three of us with skin that is sporadically sensitive, and we have never had trouble with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was gifted some of these and had to buy some on my own, they smell really good and I only used it for baby’s hands when I was out in public.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It does not irritated skin, perfect for kids and adults

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: He usado estas toallitas desde que mi bebe nacio, son super delicadas y me encantan para limpiarle las manos y la carita, son perfectas.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I still use for six year old
reviews.reviewText: I still use to wash six year old's face. Keeps her soft and clear and doesn't seem to bother her eye area.

reviews.reviewText: I love love love these! Super easy to use especially great for those little blurps and spit ups.

reviews.reviewText: These wipes are perfect for baby’s easy to clean baby hands and face after a messy meal or just to give them a quick refresh !

Yo las uso desde que mi bebe era una recién nacida y no puedo vivir sin ellas..Mi bebe tiene 7 meses y siempre me acompañan a todas partes estás Toallitas.. son hipoalergénicas, muy suaves y es pura agua 🫶🏻
